Summary: Large yellow light near Monterey Airport observed, fast in one direstion then slowed, changed direstions, dissapeared toward hills.
trends: There have been 18 other sightings in Monterey

divs: sighting detailsabout 1930 military time;perhaps a little later 1\4\2012 obderver bright yellow light over monterey, ca. light was bright yellow much large than star, in southern sky heading toward airport. light was moving fast at first, then appeared to slow as near airport\hills between monterey salinas. then dissapeared (or out of sight). event witnessed by myself and 2 friends who where on porch at time.
